column4: I installed a new drive and formated it, and transfered some files to it, but I don't have permission to read it. I've tried setting permissions with sudo in terminal, but still get 'permission denied' in term an nautilus

That didn't help. I did gksudo and changed my permissions for the drive and all of it's contents to my user and I still can't access the drive through my user. In terminal (ls -l) I just get question marks.
